column5: Well folks the time is getting closer and i dont see much talk about Lakair as i did last year. Not sure what the plans are for this year if any. Last year was great and hope to repeat the memories  great times and hopefully meet a few new friends. This is just a feel for what people are planning if anything. Cheers BMM.
It's still on, give it a couple more weeks and the chatter will really heat up!
Stockpiling Rocket Fuel as we speak!!!!!!!!
All booked etc for me.. couple more weeks then the planning really starts.
All booked here as well. Too little time there this year for me though. It'll be a good time for everyone. Looking forward to seeing/meeting old and new buds.
Bly and I are already booked....arriving Friday night and staying unil Monday.
We're already booked too, in our usual spot, for a week starting Friday night or Saturday, depending on Paul's shift that week.  Can't wait  Joey
Guess I must have been bad... cause they don't wanna talk to me ...
LOL John.. funny part is.. I typed that and Kevin emailed me at exactly 2:34 !
Thanks for the responce im pretty sure Brian has us booked but i best be getting in touch with him to finalize the arrangments looking forward to the first big meet of the season see you all there.
Cabin 5.  Checking in Thursday around noon and hanging around until the following Thursday.  Sure hope it warms up nicely for all those *%$* mosquitos.
